name: Tigris' Room
description:
Use your W, A, S, D keys to move and your mouse to look around!

This kitchen and living room is a glimpse at a potential interspecies living space – intertwining with plants for a sustainable nutritional cycle to be maintained in the comfort of one’s home.

For instance, a dandelion coffee maker where the roots of these flower are ground to a fine powder filled with inulin – a substitute to coffee grounds. Where these brewed dandelion grounds can be used as a soil fertilizer to grow other plants such as mushroom.

Also in this room, you can find a vertical farm, with growing LED lights to control the spectrum at which the light shines into the foliage of the seedlings.
